# tx-agent-kit

> Canonical URL map for docs-aware LLMs. Use these real pages first.

## Primary pointers

- https://agentkit.txdocs.dev/docs
- https://agentkit.txdocs.dev/llms-full.txt
- https://agentkit.txdocs.dev/docs/api-reference
- https://agentkit.txdocs.dev/docs/commands

## Getting started

- https://agentkit.txdocs.dev/docs/getting-started
- https://agentkit.txdocs.dev/docs/getting-started/local-setup
- https://agentkit.txdocs.dev/docs/getting-started/first-domain

- https://agentkit.txdocs.dev/docs/philosophy
